name: championed the
description:
This is 'championed the', a new video game from Outhouse Media.
It's about the development of the world. Discussing what got you interested in creating games, what made you want to make games in the first place, and how to go about making them. If you haven't played the game yet, it's worth checking out. Outhouse Media are good at making the action: they release major titles, such as Duel Lords and Severa. Their games are, by contrast, medium to long-term projects with lots of branching stories and plenty of weird puzzles. If you want to know what's in the works at Outhouse Media, check out their website. Is Euden the children's game? No, it's about, if you like, a woodcutter's daughter. And it's about a woman called Dr. V And it's about charlie And it's about flappers It's about a table-pounding bear And it's about a man who can do magic It's about a magician's daughter And a mage's son And a witch's grandson And an orphan's son It's about a school of wench It's about a madwoman's son And a unicorn's daughter And an evil wizard's son It's about a witch's daughter And a kind cat And a flower girl And a playable girl
